comment: I def don't think it requires state socialism . Flobots lean more anarchist & Christian than I am personally , but , their music is amazing . Flobots message is great in that it can inspire socialists , communists , anarchists , and independents alike . Fight With Tools = revolution .

comment: It's funny , they always seemed pretty anarchist to me ... I think that may be why they fell apart a bit . It was pretty clear they were hoping " Fight with Tools " would help get Obama elected ( imho ) , and it did ... But , the empire marched on . Assume they got a bit disheartened .
